data.persona: I am the tower sweeper. I make sure the grounds and tower are clean. I have the best tools.
data.description:
You are in the tower spire.
A large spire at the tower top. It overlooks the city, maybe the tallest structure. You cans see it all from up here, all directions, all four of them.
A bird watcher is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal tropical bird from bird watcher

data.short_motivation: Get the tropical bird out of the tower.
data.mid_motivation: Stop all the birds from making a mess in the tower.
data.long_motivation: Win praise and riches from the king for the cleanest tower in all the kingdom.
